name: FilesystemPlus
description: Enhanced filesystem extension with read-only directory support and granular permissions.
long_description:
Filesystem Plus is an enhanced version of the Claude Desktop filesystem extension that adds support for read-only directories and granular permission control. You can now configure certain directories as read-only to protect important files from accidental modification while still allowing Claude to read and analyze their contents. Perfect for keeping your critical documents safe while enabling powerful file analysis and automation.

Key features:
- Read-only directory protection
- Granular permission control
- All standard filesystem operations
- Enhanced security and safety
- Familiar user interface with checkboxes for permission management

Underneath the hood, it uses @modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem with additional permission checking middleware.

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a file (works in both read-write and read-only directories)

tools.name: read_multiple_files
tools.description: Read the contents of multiple files (works in both read-write and read-only directories)

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write content to a file (blocked in read-only directories)

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: Edit the contents of a file (blocked in read-only directories)

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create a new directory (blocked in read-only directories)

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List contents of a directory (works in both read-write and read-only directories)

tools.name: directory_tree
tools.description: Display directory structure as a tree (works in both read-write and read-only directories)

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move or rename a file (blocked for files in read-only directories)

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Search for files by name or content (works in both read-write and read-only directories)

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: Get information about a file (works in both read-write and read-only directories)

tools.name: list_allowed_directories
tools.description: List directories that can be accessed and their permission levels

full_access_directories.title: 📁 Full Access Directories
full_access_directories.description: Claude can read, write, create, and modify files in these directories

read_only_directories.title: 🔒 Read-Only Directories
read_only_directories.description: Claude can only read files in these directories (no modifications allowed)
